#include<stdio.h>
int arr[50];
int arr2[50];
int x;
int scan(void);
void quick_sort (int *a, int n) 
{
    if (n < 2)
        return;
    int p = a[n/2];
    int *l = a;
    int *r = a+n-1;
    while (l <= r) 
	{
        if (*l<p) 
	{
		l++;
            continue;
        }
        if (*r>p) 
		{
            r--;
            continue;
        }
        int t=*l;
        *l++ = *r;
        *r-- = t;
    }
    quick_sort(a,r-a+1);
    quick_sort(l,a+n-l);
}
int main()
{
	//freopen("aaa.txt","r",stdin);
	int test,m,n,i,cs=0,j,value;
	//float temp;
	test=scan();
	test/=100;
	while(test--)
	{
		cs++;
		n=scan();
		m=scan();
		n/=100;
		m/=100;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		arr2[i]=scan();
		quick_sort(arr2,n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		arr[i]=arr2[n-1-i];
		printf("Case %d:\n",cs);
		for(i=0;i<m;i++)
		{
			printf("Scenario %d:\n",i+1);
			value=scan();
			for(j=0;j<n;j++)
			{
				if(value>=arr[j])
				{
					//x=0;
					x=value/arr[j];
					value-=arr[j]*x;
					/*while(value>=arr[j])
					{
						value=value-arr[j];
						x++;
					}
					//temp=arr[j]/100.0;*/
					if(arr[j]>=100)
						printf("%d %d\n",arr[j]/100,x);
					else
						printf("%.2f %d\n",arr[j]/100.0,x);

					//value=value%arr[j];
					//if(value==0)
					//break;
				}
				
			}
		}
	}
	
	return 0;
}
int scan()
{
	int x=0,check=0;
	char ch=32;
	while(ch<48)
		ch=getchar();
	for(;;ch=getchar())
	{
		if(ch==' ' || ch=='\n')
			break;
		if(ch=='.')
		{
			check=1;
			continue;
		}
		if(ch>=48&&ch<=57)
			x=x*10+(ch-48);
	}
if(check==1)
return x;
else
return x*100;
}
